statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPKMSCryptoKey)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSKeyRing)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPLocation)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMS Cryptokeys that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPKMSCryptoKey)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSKeyRing)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPLocation)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPKMSCryptoKey-to-Keyrings relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPKMSKeyRing)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPLocation)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMS Keyrings that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPKMSKeyRing)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPLocation)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPKMSKeyRing-to-Location relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPLocation)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMSLocations that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPLocation)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPLocation-to-Project relationships that are out of date.

name: Cleanup GCP KMS Locations, Keyrings and Cryptokeys.
